website_summaries.verdict: A simple standing lamp that works well for extended periods of time.
pros: When used properly, this far infrared lamp provides soothing energy that quickly relieves pain and warms targeted areas
The heat-coil style means this lamp can be used for periods of 40 minutes, far longer than most infrared lamps
cons: Some customers noticed that their lamps lost power over several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the head of the lamp is pushed all the way in, into the stand housing.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product, I thought it was defective (the head of the lamp didn't stay attached to the stand). However, after I started the return process I realized that the product wasn't defective at all. You just have to push the head of the lamp pretty hard into the housing on the stand. After realizing this I cancelled the return process. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and Melted
customer_reviews.text: After using this daily for a year, the lamp stopped heating. Turns out the unit got overheated and melted the wires within the lamp. The plug that attaches the head to the rest of the unit is melted, as well as the plastic covering the knob. The entire wiring system is shot. I'm lucky this didn't catch fire and burn the place down. I have another one of these units that I'll keep an eye on in case the same thing happens. Will never purchase heat lamps from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: PChang

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. I have had no issues with it not heating up. I typically use it for about an hour a day. I will amend the review if this changes. For those who have complained that theirs was not heating up & the seller is really saying it's not supposed to get hot, it's simply not true. It should and does get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Warm-up time is 20 minutes, otherwise a great far infrared lamp for home
customer_reviews.text: Once this lamp gets going, meaning it heats up, it is great. However if you have limited time for preplanning a good 20 minute wait, this is not for you. I love how the lamp is designed. Once it gets hit enough, it works great. My only issue is the wait time. At first I was not sure if the timer and the power were connected but I found that the la,p will not get hot unless you also set the timer. Overall, for the price, I am happy with this because it looks pretty good, is not too bulky and feels great once heated.
customer_reviews.author: steelbird

customer_reviews.title: I saw fire when I use this product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this lamp about a year ago. I used this last year and this year hadn't use it for a while. When I use this a few days ago, I heard something and today I saw it was something actually burning in the head. OMG, it is on fire! See the pictures I took. I updates this review because this company really take responsibility for their product. They help me fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lastted just over a month
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived in August it worked. It is now September and the unit has a greatlt reduced output probably less than 10 percent. You can barely feel anything after 15 minutes even directly under the head. They say 1500 hours but I figured I got maybe one hundred hour at best.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 7 months, using it 10 hours a week.
customer_reviews.text: I have had other heat lamps that lasted 16 years at the rate I use them. This one went barely over 6 months. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: The position is easy adjust, and the area of warm is large
customer_reviews.text: After received it for one month, our family can’t live without it. The pain and discomfort release with the help of this warm lamp. The position is easy adjust, and the area of warm is large. Very satisfied with it. It could be on my buying without regret list.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Pie

customer_reviews.title: It was shipped promptly and is doing a very good job in the overall cancer treatment of my wife
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped promptly and is doing a very good job in the overall cancer treatment of my wife. Very happy with it and would recommend it to anyone! RHW
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for disabled sister
customer_reviews.text: My sister has SMA and her hands and feet get really cold, she uses it while she works at her computer or is just reading a book. Definitely worth the money. Also, the dog loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Plas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very helpful for neck pain, arthritis or any inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: James Bertini

customer_reviews.title: Saved me when I was in great pain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product by the end of 2017, and I am still using it in 2020! It really has great quality and serves me as it is designed. I recently got a stiff neck and shoulder on my right side. I could barely move off my bed as I was in great pain. With one hour of using this lamp, although I was still in pain, I could at least move a bit. By continuously using this lamp, I got better day by day. This definitely worths the money. I am super glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BunnyMartini

customer_reviews.title: It keeps me well
customer_reviews.text: When I get chills, or a tummy ache, or my knee hurts - this lamp does it all. I have used this lamp for over 10 years and I would not live without it. The very best thing for healing infections. I use it so much I have replaced the head several times in the past, that is no big deal and is very inexpensive and far outweighs the benefits. I have two lampsize for my birds too.
customer_reviews.author: JR44

customer_reviews.title: Well I got the lamp head to stay on the right way so it now gets a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Well I got my lamp does everything it's supposed to do.The only issue I have is that when I tighten the knob for the head it will loosen up and fall off.Any ideas to fix the issue.Do the dimples on the head go all the way in and do it snap on.I would give it a 5 if I can fix the head.But I love the lamp for my knee
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to warm up!
customer_reviews.text: This heater takes too long to warm up. I’ve purchased multiple other ones that get the job done better in a quicker time. If it takes a long time to warm up; just imagine how much power it’s wasting to get there.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the value. The only reason why I did not give this product 5 stars , is because the unit DOES make "tick tick" noises while on. So it's not completely silenced while in use. Otherwise;Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic adjuster cracked and broke after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is working fine. But the plastic part that adjusts the head up and down cracked and broke off after after less than a year. Previous models have a metal adjuster....for the obvious reason that a small plastic part can't hold up the heavy metal head without being tightened way down.
customer_reviews.author: pirate

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made on amazon! Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Life saver for hurt knees, back feet and hands. It feels like a warm hug, after 20-30, your pain practically melts away. I’m hot blooded and live in hot steamy Florida, his heat is so enjoyable. Buy it! I’ve used it multiple times, no problems with how it works. It does have a very heavy base. Keep that in mind if you need to take it up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: CindyRo

customer_reviews.title: This model is very much like the more expensive heat lamp our accupuncturist uses
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. This model is very much like the more expensive heat lamp our accupuncturist uses. It works well for warming up after snow blowing the large driveway. Works best for me using the lamp approx. 15" from the body part that needs warming.
customer_reviews.author: C. M-R

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one 3 years ago and it still works well. It helps with my stomach pain, back pain and sleeping problem, etc., I call it "magic" therapy lamp. I purchased another one for my family recently. The 2nd one stopped working a couple of weeks ago. I contacted the seller K.S. Choi Corporation. They did trouble shooting and sent me a new one. I am using the new one, it works well. I am very happy with the product and the seller's service.
customer_reviews.author: Happpy customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for my bad sinus infections.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy quality. Easy to assemble without assembly instructions (which is good since it doesn't come with any), like the timer feature (optional to use). I set it for the max of 60 minutes, so I can keep an eye on the time to ensure I give it 15 minutes to warm up. I use this for sinus infections, as this is something my ENT uses. I notice improvement using the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great quality and quite possibly the best thing I’ve ever bought on Amazon!! I am thankful this was so easy to find and set up. I would definitely recommend this product if you are in the market for an infared lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Mac

customer_reviews.title: I liked the grate to the heat lamp
customer_reviews.text: I liked the grate to the heat lamp. the quality of the wheels has sufficiently declined. Can't hardly move it. my old one had steel rollers and fit properly. but very glad to get a new one. It is sad that you can't get them outside of amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: J B Nyds

customer_reviews.title: Wife finds infrared heat beneficial!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived on time and well packed. Followed simple instructions to assemble and pressed into service almost on arrival wife reports pain relief from arthritis and very happy
customer_reviews.author: billfern

customer_reviews.title: head lamp lasted less than 300 hour max.
customer_reviews.text: warning! You do not know how long it will last. I use this lamp no more than 300 hours since I have 2 more TDP lamps that are warmed up quickly. 1. it take for ever to get warmed up. 2. there is no warranty on the lamp even it stopped working in less than couple hundreds of hours 3. lamp head replacement cost you 60 dollars to buy re- think to buy this from here.
customer_reviews.author: Son S. Sunae

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my acupuncturist to work along with the treatments I was receiving. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Fore

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble even thought there was no instruction sheet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the night before and it arrived the next morning. It's easy to assemble even thought there was no instruction sheet. Would appreciate more if there was one.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Chung

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it on 7/13/17 and it stopped working on 4/13/18. Less than 1 year. It's from China so no warranty that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: so far I am using it in my clinic and it works great! great outcomes and patient's are feeling better!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina K. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Stable TDP Lamp with Wide Base.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this last week and I was surprised at how sturdy it is. Very easy to assemble and can't beat the price. It does come with extra fuses. I've used it already on a long time patient and she really liked it. Hopefully, it will hold up. I will be ordering another to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you do not have to force in the head to ...
customer_reviews.text: you do not have to force in the head to the arm as some have said. there is a little screw adjustment. Loosen, insert, tighten
customer_reviews.author: ginny murnane

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical with some reviews I had read, but am very pleased with this lamp. Base is heavier than I expected and it lends to nice stability. Easy to roll around and position. Been using for multiple months now and have had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: Some of these lamps are great and are still working since 2013 while I just ordered another one last month and it came with no wheels and the lamp worked for about 2 hours. I appreciate them taking back the TDP lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it takes a long time to heat up but it works perfectly and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Serena clavenna

customer_reviews.title: I warm it up for 15 minutes and she is happy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this. I warm it up for 15 minutes and she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: ernie f.

customer_reviews.title: wheels roll easily. heats up quickly and gets hot
customer_reviews.text: Heavy base. wheels roll easily. heats up quickly and gets hot. One of the best quality TDP lamps I've bought. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: mom to be

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but takes a long time to heat up.
customer_reviews.text: This guy really puts the heat where you want it, but it takes a long time to heat up. When you are in pain and need to use it, that 15 minute wait is heck. Once you get about 10 minutes of use though, you are glad you waited.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: broke down in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these lamps to use in october 2019 and both units died in 6 months. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dr. alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it every nigh to release stress on specific areas, recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had a more stable stand, have to be careful when wheeling it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Needs better design
customer_reviews.text: The wheel keeps falling off everytime I move it making it very unstable!
customer_reviews.author: RaeAnne R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! It helps so much in healing the back.
customer_reviews.author: Conghe Song

customer_reviews.title: heat lamp is not working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last year and only used two times with less than few days of each time. Now it is no good - after the power on, the heat lamp has no heat and light.
customer_reviews.author: Yosemite

customer_reviews.title: Great for an acupuncture or massage therapy office but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for an acupuncture or massage therapy office but it takes 10 minutes to warm up. Recommend you turn it on when the patient arrives so it is warm when they lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these heat lamps in my practice and my patients love the heat on their feet or back or knees or where ever. K.S Choi is great supplier
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Lamp is not good. I just used it several times, then it is died.
customer_reviews.author: Fangxi Zhou

customer_reviews.title: It relaxes me and helps with the muscle pain , stiffness
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bulky in awkward what does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Nancy0111

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality .
customer_reviews.text: I used it for patient treatment. The product's quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: JINSHENG WU

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a year later.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon and started using it February 2018. It stopped working February 2019. Do you have any warranties?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O-B

customer_reviews.title: INFRARED LAMP
customer_reviews.text: WE USE THIS PRODUCT ON OUR PATIENTS, HOWEVER WE CANT USE THE LIGHT BECAUSE THE LIGHT FIXTURE (WITH THE BULB) WILL NOT STAY ON THE LAMP. IT KEEPS FALLING OFF.
customer_reviews.author: PHEADRA

customer_reviews.title: all in all it makes my back feel a little better. May be too early to give a fair ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times. Seems well constructed, wish it had a longer cord, all in all it makes my back feel a little better. May be too early to give a fair assessment at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Hwayne69

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for several days. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Zou

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great, but one wheel arrived broken so it won’t roll around.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my mother-in-law. She had strained a muscle or tendon in her lower back/waist that was irritating the nerve that runs down the back of the leg and was causing numbness in her foot. The lamp, together with some coconut oil dissipated the knot and provided relief. YouTube physical therapy exercises also helped. She is walking great and without pain. This is a quality product. Solid and effective.
customer_reviews.author: William K

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this heat lamp because of many good reviews. But the quality of the hardware is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heat lamp because of many good reviews. But the quality of the hardware is not as good as I expected. First of all the base is big and chunky, but the lamp stand rod is so unsecure when "screw" on the base. The whole rod can swing freely about 10 - 15 degree around the center. I don't even bother to test the lamp itself. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: liz980

customer_reviews.title: I hope to have after-sales service
customer_reviews.text: The product is broken very early, I hope to have after-sales service, please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm the cold damp pain away.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected providing deep penetrating heat to increase circulation and decrease inflammation in cold sore joints and muscles. I have had these last 10 years or one year. The replaceable head is a nice upgrade. I think TDP lamps are all made in the same factory despite who slaps their label on it. You can pay more but why?
customer_reviews.author: Collin Stoll L.Ac.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this lamp for  arthritis pain.
customer_reviews.text: It did work very good for my pains but I won't be able to use it for a while because of my total knee replacement surgery.
customer_reviews.author: sudha tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. Could use more instructions on how long and how often to use lamp.
customer_reviews.author: dorotha jenkins

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the price. I like it. Wish that the lamp can be warmer than it is. Useful in home or professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomend for all kinds of pain/healing
customer_reviews.text: Im addicted to this. HIGHLY reccomend it. For pain, for sore muscles, for arthiritis. You name it. Even my cat squeezes in to get some of the heat. its better than a heating pad because it relaxes the under layer muscles. Have had knee pain for 10+ years and since I started using this, no more pain. It was easy to put together and is easy to move around the house and move up/down adjust if you want to sit or lay down and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gerwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used on my neck after being recommended by my acupuncturist. It seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: TOOTH FAIRY

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific addition to my health keeping arsenal. I was already aware of the healing benefits of the Mineral Infrared Heat Lamp and am now able to use it everyday for the osteoarthritis in my knee. The price is great, the unit is easy to assemble and use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office.
customer_reviews.text: Use it almost daily. A great addition to my clinic and great for the price. It takes a little while to heat up is the only set back. Once I set needles then i can talk to the patient until it heats up...
customer_reviews.author: bestpiperonmars

customer_reviews.title: heal
customer_reviews.text: if you want to heal a skin injury or condition this is a great product. For deep tissue penetration, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rescue your pet

customer_reviews.title: Not as warm as expected
customer_reviews.text: I remember tdp lamps to emit more heat. Either this piece has a malfunction or the maximum heat it gives out is not as warm as needed.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great purchase for my arthritis that turned into a great ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase for my arthritis that turned into a great purchase for the whole family. Sore muscles, injuries & broken bones have all benefited from this light.
customer_reviews.author: KATILIN RAMSFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Great item, works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item for several weeks now and it is great, good design and really helps with my lower back pain and keeping the muscles loose. Would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and would recommend to anyone, this product will preform as described and does what you would expect.so would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work in my acupuncture practice all the time. Patients love it and it is a very effective method for delivering heat.
customer_reviews.author: Bajda Welty

customer_reviews.title: It works .....
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried it, it seemed not working as advertised. It needs more than 10 minutes to warm up. After that it works fine. It is different from other NIR lighting. It doesn't radiate much heat as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Lin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Way too unstable on the base, it did not even screw in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Lamp Effective?
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended the TDP (Mineral) lamp to help me recouperate from rotator cuff surgery. The lamp is well made and appears sturdy. It's easy to assemble and use with a timer cut-off switch. The real question is whether there is any benefit other than the heat feels good and the jury is still out on that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Radiationtherapy
customer_reviews.text: Lamp works well; the moving arm allows us to point the lamp directly on the areas to be treated. Low heat, which makes it pleasant and tolerable. We use it to treat cancer instead of applying the conventional radio therapy, which has so many side effects. We trust that the red light will do its work in fighting back the cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: TDP
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp, I like the feature that all you have to do is detach the head to replace. Other ones you have to actually take the head apart (asbestos lines the coil)sot this seems a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: DKC

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this meets my needs in always. the packaging was ok. the few assembly requirements were a little difficult because they were shoddily poured in the plastic injection. it took a little finagling to get the stand to work. i think the company could have a little bit more control over the quality in manufacture of that piece. the item itseld works well, is effective and i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rhamba

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the condition of the item. Or the function of it. It doesnt work properly. I spoke directly with the company mgr and he was not helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: cola

customer_reviews.title: Does not work very well don't bother ordering
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother ordering it does not work very well. Gets really hot. Fire hazarded. It is very heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Limited range but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great for an acupuncture or massage therapy office but it takes 10 minutes to warm up. Recommend you turn it on when the patient arrives so it is warm when they lay down. The coverage area is small so you may need two lamps for air conditioned offices if doing full body needles. The timer is useless as it clicks loudly and annoys everyone. Turn it on and leave it.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price affordable for home use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, works as expected even though it is smaller than the one in my acupuncturist office. The timer is not noisy as some other models do you have that bothersome sound reported but not this one. I am very happy with the product and the speed of shipping. Yes I would recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Michael C. Miller Phd

customer_reviews.title: Found it to be a good investment. One caution
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Found it to be a good investment. One caution, wear light clothing while using it. A tee shirt or something similar. That's what the manufacturer recommends. I tried it without and it seemed to dry out the skin. Don't fall for those advertising pictures. It's great, it's safe if used as directed. Highly recommend. Found it to be of good quality materials. Well factory packed. Don't believe that screwed up picture that is posted on Amazon. That wasn't factory packing. That was just a 'TROLL'.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several far infrared lamps and this one is as good as any Ive had. I like the replaceable head feature. The past stand I used had 5 legs, this has only 4 but seems enough for stability. So far so good. Simple, nothing fancy yet seems to get the job done!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: This lamp does exactly what it supposed to do. It is the same one my Acupuncturist uses. I use it for my freezing feet, they are freezing even on a 90 degree day on hot tar. I use this for 15 minutes once a week and it does wonders. I thought the base looked small in the picture, but it is very sturdy and heavy. It took me about 5-10 minutes to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Helps my damaged rotator cuff. Eased the pain and the deep heat is helping it heal by bringing in nutrients to the affected tendons (in my case). Some reviewers said they don't like the ticking sound of the timer, but I like it. I like hearing it as I rest under the lamp for 40 minutes. I find it soothing and usually fall asleep. The lamp is well made and I'm really glad I brought it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Far Infrared Lamp could use better quality wheels and screws.
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly not up to par with my expectations. The wheels keep coming unscrewed and the wheel falls out while I am moving it across the floor. I have had to stop and put the wheel in multiple times. I'm NOT very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha B'ham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, Buy this one for family.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is poor quality. The heat element lamp part is not very securely held in place and could easily fall out onto a patient. The stem of the lamp where you can twist to adjust the height is also terrible and not very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good heat lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp several months and use 4- times per week. The timer is extremely noisy so I use it on the continuous on setting. Heavy base so it does not tip over when moving. The screw together connections seem to come loose every few days so I check and tighten frequently.
customer_reviews.author: SDTodd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pain reliever.
customer_reviews.text: This infrared lamp works very well. I use it for helping clear my sinuses when I have a sinus headache, and for heating up to relax muscles. It turns out to be the same lamp my massage therapist has and uses on her clients. It's wonderful. And the base makes it very stable. But BE CAREFUL, it gets HOT!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Very therapeutic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used the small version at my physical therapy doctor for years. Love it. Helps easy muscles, pain and its so relaxing I fall asleep. This larger one is fabulous and can reach more areas on you body. Great for use in bed, couch on a chair. Must have item.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Conner

customer_reviews.title: I like it but don't use it often because it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but don't use it often because it takes a lot of time to warm up & then wait for the treatment. It was inoperative on delivery which turned out to be a loose wire in the heating element connector (not a repair everyone can do), works great now! The infussion of warmth indeed feels quite pleasant & envigorating.
customer_reviews.author: GY

customer_reviews.title: and of generally good quality. I find the mount where the electrical ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stand and heat lamp at this price seems appropriate. Overall, the product is effective, enduring, and of generally good quality. I find the mount where the electrical control box meets the stand is of questionable stability and requires regular tightening of the screw.
customer_reviews.author: one who cares

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This TDP lamp produces healing infrared light that penetrates deep into the tissues. The quality is good and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This I can’t live without, it is so good! Very happy with it. It helps with all the aches and pains and joint pains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool I have ever invested in. I do massage therapy and I use it on everyone! All of my clients have noticed a difference and so have I in their muscles. I have also used it on myself, my hands, and it was a big difference in how they felt. My good friend with diabetes used my light and it helps her hands and feet feel much better! Nothing but love.
customer_reviews.author: Jen shay

customer_reviews.title: An excellent in home treatment device
customer_reviews.text: This is a great in home treatment device. It is easy to put together and can be easily maneuvered to the desired area. The heat is very penetrating and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Yankelovich

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fibrosis
customer_reviews.text: Will buy more. Works great for fibrosis, to dissolve hardened fluids.
customer_reviews.author: Supershopper

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Have had pain in the upper back shoulders and neck for many years. This lamp sure does help with that. Lamp is surprisingly well made. The timer can be heard ticking, but it is not excessively loud. No regrets for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability and the fact that it is NOT a light, just the soothing heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in Granville

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lamp. Just as good of quality as any ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. Just as good of quality as any I could have purchased from my other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Pusateri

product_meta.title: TDP Far Infrared Mineral Heat Lamp with a Detachable Head (KS 9800)
feature_bullets: TDP Heat Lamps with large head size as far-infrared heating lamp by the U.S. FDA.
The heat produced by our Infrared heat lamp does not utilize high heating temperature, yet still allows excellent Infrared penetration through the skin.
TDP works with coil heat and a mineral plate (no light bulb needed). The Mineral Plate (6.5" in diameter, life span of up to 1,500 hrs) emits Far Infrared Rays when heated.
Please wait at least 10-20 minutes for heat. Typical treatment sessions should last a minimum of 40 min per area.
110V Detachable head - simply unplug the cord that connects the head and the main frame when replacing.
